code: import{useCallback,useMemo}from'react';import{currencyFormatter,renderDate}from'Utils/formatters';import{exportToXLS}from'Utils/functions';var useExportData=function useExportData(items){var columns=useMemo(function(){return[{name:'Vencimento',key:'expirationDate',render:function render(financial){return renderDate(financial.expirationDate);}},{name:'Pagamento',key:'paymentDate',render:function render(financial){return renderDate(financial.paymentDate);}},{name:'Conta',key:'financialAccount_description'},{name:'Nº do Processo',key:'process_number'},{name:'Categoria',key:'category_description'},{name:'Movimentação',key:'movement_description'},{name:'Valor',key:'value',render:function render(financial){return currencyFormatter(financial.value,{cents:true});}},{name:'Desconto',key:'discount',render:function render(financial){return currencyFormatter(financial.discount,{cents:true});}},{name:'Total',key:'total',render:function render(financial){return currencyFormatter(financial.total,{cents:true});}}];},[]);var exportFile=useCallback(function(){var file_name='financeiro';exportToXLS(file_name,items,columns);},[columns,items]);return exportFile;};export default useExportData;
